scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules && rm -rf dist && rm -rf prisma/migrations && rm -rf prisma/spotify.db* && rm -rf .next
scripts.init: npm install && rm -rf dist && rm -rf prisma/migrations && rm -rf prisma/spotify.db* && npx prisma migrate dev --name init && npx prisma generate && mkdir dist
scripts.build: next build && cp -R .next/standalone/** dist && cp .next/standalone/.next/** dist/.next && cp -R public/** dist/public && cp -R prisma/** dist/prisma
